game.name: Fallout: New Vegas
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. Enjoy your stay!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. Enjoy your stay!

reviewHighlights.text: I have played this game since its release as well as fallout 3 and fallout 4. I have countless hours across xbox copies, gog buys, *downloaded* copies...
Just had to say that this is selling for 4.99 while fallout 76, is selling for 3.99. A decade older and still outperforming the newest installment, ma...
